analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha tshe rings por mi skye ba'i thabs mkhas pa de lta bu de la yod de /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha tshe rings por mi skye ba'i thabs mkhas pa de lta bu de la yod de /
translated: “Subhūti, there is a skillful means by which bodhisattva great beings do not take rebirth as long-lived gods.

original: de'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de'ang gang zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las thabs mkhas pa bstan te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las thabs mkhas pa bstan te /
translated: the skillful means taught in this perfection of wisdom.

original: thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings who have that skillful means enter into the meditative stabilizations,

original: tshad med pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug /
translated: enter into the immeasurable ones,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snyoms @370b par 'jug ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snyoms @370b par 'jug ste /
translated: and enter into the formless absorptions,

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o //
translated: but they are not reborn by the power of the meditative stabilizations, the immeasurable ones, or the formless absorptions.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training like that

original: 'di lta ste nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba'i dri ma yongs su dag pas /
analyzed: 'di lta ste nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba'i dri ma yongs su dag pas /
translated: It is like this: by the purification of the stain of the mental activity of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: the purification of the power of all buddhadharmas is attained.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Bhagavān,

original: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa lags na /
analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa lags na /
translated: if all dharmas are pure by nature,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang gi stobs yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang gi stobs yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba lags /
translated: what dharma’s power will bodhisattva mahāsattvas attain purification of?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: The Bhagavān replied,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: “Subhūti, it is so, it is so!

original: ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no //
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, all dharmas are pure by nature.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la /
translated: Subhūti, in that way, in all dharmas that are pure,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: when bodhisattva mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: sems zhum pa med cing 'god pa med pa de ni /
analyzed: sems zhum pa med cing 'god pa med pa de ni /
translated: It is to be without mental slackness or agitation.🔽

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /🔽byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni chos nyid de mi shes mi mthong bas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste / byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni chos nyid de mi shes mi mthong bas /
translated: This is the perfection of wisdom,🔽Subhuti, which the Bodhisattvas, the great beings, should course in.

original: sems can de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
analyzed: sems can de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
translated: And why? Because in this perfection of wisdom the Suchness of all dharmas is revealed,

original: bzod pa'i pha @371a *//
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha @371a *//
translated: and that Suchness of all dharmas is not made nor unmade, does not increase nor decrease, does not go nor come, is not defiled nor purified, does not wax nor wane.🔽In this perfection of wisdom the Suchness of form, etc.

original: rol tu phyin pa la spyod //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
analyzed: rol tu phyin pa la spyod // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
translated: is revealed, and that Suchness of form, etc.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
translated: is not made nor unmade, does not increase nor decrease, does not go nor come, is not defiled nor purified, does not wax nor wane.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /🔽nang stong pa nyid la spyod /🔽phyi stong pa nyid la spyod /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod / nang stong pa nyid la spyod / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod /
translated: In this perfection of wisdom the Suchness of the fruit of a Streamwinner, etc.🔽is revealed, and that Suchness of the fruit of a Streamwinner, etc.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod /
translated: is not made nor unmade, does not increase nor decrease, does not go nor come, is not defiled nor purified, does not wax nor wane.🔽In this perfection of wisdom the Suchness of the fruit of a Pratyekabuddha,🔽the Suchness of a Bodhisattva,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod /🔽chen po stong pa nyid la spyod /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod /🔽chen po stong pa nyid la spyod /
translated: the Suchness of a Buddha,🔽is revealed, and that Suchness of a Buddha is not made nor unmade, does not increase nor decrease, does not go nor come, is not defiled nor purified, does not wax nor wane.🔽In this perfection of wisdom the Suchness of all dharmas is revealed, and that Suchness of all dharmas is not made nor unmade, does not increase nor decrease, does not go nor come, is not defiled nor purified, does not wax nor wane.🔽In this perfection of wisdom the Suchness of the knowledge of all modes is revealed, and that Suchness of the knowledge of all modes is not made nor unmade, does not increase nor decrease, does not go nor come, is not defiled nor purified, does not wax nor wane.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod /
translated: They practice the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽They practice the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod /
translated: They practice the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽They practice the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽They practice the emptiness of what is without beginning or end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod /
translated: They practice the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod /
translated: They practice the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod /
translated: They practice the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod /
translated: They practice the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽They practice the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod /
translated: They practice the emptiness of non-entities.🔽They practice the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod /
translated: They practice the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la spyod /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la spyod /
translated: They practice the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod /
translated: They practice the four right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod /🔽dbang po lnga la spyod /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod / dbang po lnga la spyod /
translated: They practice the four legs of miraculous power.🔽They practice the five faculties.

original: stobs lnga la spyod /
analyzed: stobs lnga la spyod /
translated: They practice the five powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod /
translated: they practice the seven branches of enlightenment;

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod /
translated: they practice the eightfold noble path;

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod /
translated: they practice the four noble truths;

original: bsam gtan bzhi la spyod /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi la spyod /
translated: they practice the four concentrations;

original: tshad med pa bzhi la spyod /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi la spyod /
translated: they practice the four immeasurables;

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod /
translated: they practice the four formless absorptions;

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod /
translated: they practice the eight aspects of liberation;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par @371b 'jug pa dgu la spyod /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par @371b 'jug pa dgu la spyod /
translated: they practice the nine serial steps of meditative absorption;

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod /
translated: they practice the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to liberation;

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod /
translated: they practice the higher perceptions;

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod /
translated: they practice the meditative stabilities;

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod /
translated: they practice the dhāraṇī gateways;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod /
translated: they practice the ten powers of the tathāgatas;

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod /
translated: they practice the four fearlessnesses;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod /🔽byams pa chen po la spyod /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod / byams pa chen po la spyod /
translated: they practice the four detailed and thorough knowledges;🔽they practice great love;

original: snying rje chen po la spyod /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la spyod /
translated: they practice great compassion;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod /
translated: they practice the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod /
translated: they practice the result of stream enterer,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod /
translated: they practice the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod /
translated: they practice the result of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod /
translated: they practice the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub la spyod /
analyzed: rang byang chub la spyod /
translated: they practice a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod /
translated: they practice the knowledge of path aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod de /
translated: and they practice the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad kyi stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa nyid rab tu thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad kyi stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa nyid rab tu thob par 'gyur te /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training like that will attain the power and fearlessness of all dharmas

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo //
translated: and will not fall to the śrāvaka or pratyekabuddha levels.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / g-yo ba rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / g-yo ba rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training like that will reach the other side of the thoughts, conduct, and movements of all beings.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sa chen po'i phyogs gang na dzambu'i chu klung gi gser gyi sa le sbram 'byung ba de lta bu ni chos nyung ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste / dper na / sa chen po'i phyogs gang na dzambu'i chu klung gi gser gyi sa le sbram 'byung ba de lta bu ni chos nyung ngo //
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du 'di lta ste /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol @372a *//🔽tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la slob pa'i sems can de lta bu'ang nyung ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du 'di lta ste / shes rab kyi pha rol @372a *// tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la slob pa'i sems can de lta bu'ang nyung ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa'am /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas ches mang ngo //
analyzed: sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa'am / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas ches mang ngo //
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:🔽Subhūti, it is like this:

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sems can gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta bu ni nyung ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste / dper na / sems can gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta bu ni nyung ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: sems can gang khams kyi rgyal phran du 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa de lta bu ni ches mang ngo //
analyzed: sems can gang khams kyi rgyal phran du 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa de lta bu ni ches mang ngo //
translated: Subhūti, it

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du sems can gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'dir 'jug pa de lta bu'ang nyung ste /🔽sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du sems can gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'dir 'jug pa de lta bu'ang nyung ste / sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, there are few beings who enter this path to the knowledge of all modes.🔽But there are many more beings who stand on the level of the śrāvakas

original: rab sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas kyang ches mang ngo //
analyzed: rab sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas kyang ches mang ngo //
translated: or on the level of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: rab 'byor / gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag pas ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag pas ni /
translated: “Subhūti, compared to the bodhisattva great beings who have set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de lta bu ches nyung ngo //🔽de bas kyang sems can gang nyan thos sam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de lta bu ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang sems can gang nyan thos sam /
translated: there are even fewer bodhisattva great beings who practice in accordance with reality.🔽But there are many more beings who stand on the level of the śrāvakas

original: rang sangs rgyas su gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni ches mang ngo //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas su gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni ches mang ngo //
translated: or on the level of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: rab 'byor / gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am /
translated: “Subhūti, compared to the sons of a good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas

original: rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu @372b phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing /🔽the tshom med par phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon pa de dag pas ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu @372b phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing / the tshom med par phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon pa de dag pas ni /
translated: “Son of a good family, those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who practice this deep perfection of wisdom

original: gang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ba de lta bu ches mang ngo //
analyzed: gang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ba de lta bu ches mang ngo //
translated: and who have no doubts will outnumber those who have not reached the irreversible level by a lot.🔽“Subhūti, those who have reached the irreversible level will outnumber those who have not reached the irreversible level by a lot.

original: rab 'byor / de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'dod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sar chud par 'dod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'dod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sar chud par 'dod pas /
translated: “Therefore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who want to reach the irreversible level and who want to enter the irreversible level

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: should train in just this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom

original: ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //
analyzed: ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //
translated: a mind possessing stinginess does not arise.

original: tshul khrims ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //
translated: A mind possessing bad morality does not arise.

original: 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //
analyzed: 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //
translated: A mind possessing anger does not arise.

original: le lo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //
analyzed: le lo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //
translated: a mind that is lazy does not arise,

original: g-yeng ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //
